DOC.detailed_description: Personality target cognitive behavioural intervention show effective reduce alcohol drug misuse adult substance abuser ( Conrod et al. , 2000 ) adolescent drinker ( Conrod et al , press ) . As intervention target personality trait link risk addictive non-addictive psychopathology , aim study examine extent approach effective prevent and/or reduce alcohol drug misuse concurrent psychiatric symptom young people . Method : 875 Participants age 13-16 year screen personality risk school-wide self-report assessment . Participants randomly assign personality match cognitive-behavioural intervention no-intervention control . The personality match intervention target four personality risk factor : negative thinking ( NT ) , anxiety sensitivity ( AS ) , impulsivity ( IMP ) sensation seek ( SS ) . Outcome evaluation occur 6 , 12 , 18 24 month post intervention . Primary outcomes time onset severity alcohol illicit substance use misuse . Secondary outcome variable include depressive symptom , panic attack rate , reckless antisocial behaviour . Secondary analysis involve genetic , cognitive coping skill measure examine moderator treatment effect .
